main event: A meteor-like object was observed by two pilots during a night navigation training mission on December 12, 1961.
interesting points: The object changed color from white to yellow and then reddish-yellow., The object first glowed as a sphere before seemingly exploding into four segments., Both pilots noted the high frequency of meteor sightings during their flight., The sighting lasted approximately 25-30 seconds., The elevation of the object changed from 45 degrees above the horizon to about 10 degrees.
